data.title: Mitsuaki Hoshino
data.meta_description: Mitsuaki Hoshino (星野充昭, Hoshino Mitsuaki) is the voice actor of Reporter Yoshizawa and Makoto Kikuchi's father, Shinichi Kikuchi, in his singular appearance. He is currently affiliated with ARTSVISION.
data.text:
Mitsuaki Hoshino Profile Information

Name: 星野充昭 (Hoshino Mitsuaki) Birthplace: Shizuoka, Japan Birthdate: February 19th, 1959 Age: 65 Agency: ARTSVISION Occupation: Actor, voice actor

External Links

Agency Page

Mitsuaki Hoshino (星野充昭, Hoshino Mitsuaki) is the voice actor of Reporter Yoshizawa and Makoto Kikuchi's father, Shinichi Kikuchi, in his singular appearance. He is currently affiliated with ARTSVISION.

THE iDOLM@STER Related Work

Anime
